name: SPX Implied Volatility Surface Modeling
description: Automatically model and visualize the SPX implied volatility surface using advanced quantitative methods like SVI and SABR. Track how market sentiment evolves over time with smooth, data-driven insights from recent trading sessions.

name: Cryptocurrency Market Correlation Analysis
description: Explore how the top digital assets move together across market cycles. This analysis uncovers relationships and risk clusters across leading cryptocurrencies using a full year of market data.

name: User Event Engagement Funnel (BigQuery + Amplitude)
description: Connect BigQuery and Amplitude data to measure engagement drop-off points in your event funnel. Identify users who viewed events but didn't RSVP to improve conversion strategies and event outreach.

name: Beijing Air Quality Prediction
description: Leverage environmental and weather data to predict PM2.5 pollution levels in Beijing. A random forest model highlights which meteorological factors most influence air quality and model accuracy.
